description.en: Complete master ensuite renovation in Toorak featuring floor-to-ceiling Calacatta marble-look porcelain, a freestanding bath surround, frameless shower with linear drain, heated flooring, and full waterproofing to AS 3740.
description.zh: Toorak主卧套间全面翻新，采用通顶卡拉卡塔仿大理石瓷质砖、独立浴缸围边、无框淋浴间配线性地漏、地暖系统，以及符合AS 3740标准的全面防水。
